page.title: 14RELIGION - COOKSTOWN
page.content: There are many different religions represented in Cookstown.Presbyterian, Plymouth Brethern,Free Methodist,Free Presbyterian,Roman Catholic and Jehova's Witness.The main differences are between Protestants and Roman Catholics.The Catholics worship in a chapel and worship many different things than Protestants.Last week the Catholics had a Holy Week when they had stalls outside the chapel selling Rosary beeds. Relationships between Catholics and Protestants are often a source of problems.While personal relationships are usually very good,tensions between groups are often strained especially during the "marching season"of July and August.This is when each commumity seems compelled to express basic territorial claims.
